extension.name: EasyBlog Most Active Bloggers
extension.author: StackIdeas
extension.description: Most active bloggers module for your EasyBlog's component.

param.name: routingtype
param.label: Routing Type
param.description: Choose the routing type when generate blogger link

param.name: menuitemid
param.label: Use Menu Item
param.description: Select menu item if you have choose to use 'menu item' as routing type

param.name: catid
param.label: Category Id
param.description: Enter category id here to filter the posts by specified category id. Use comma to separate multiple categories.

param.name: count
param.label: Count
param.description: The number of items to display (set it to 0 if number of blogger limiting if not required).

param.name: showavatar
param.label: Show Blogger's Avatar
param.description: Show or hide blogger's avatar in the module.

param.name: avatarwidth
param.label: Avatar's Width (px)
param.description: Specify the width of blogger avatar.

param.name: avatarheight
param.label: Avatar's Height (px)
param.description: Specify the height of blogger avatar.

param.name: showwbiotext
param.label: Show Blogger's Bio Info
param.description: Show or hide blogger's bio info in the module.

param.name: showwebsite
param.label: Show Blogger's Website
param.description: Show or hide blogger's website in the module.

param.name: showcount
param.label: Show Total Post Count
param.description: Show or hide the number of total post count in the module.

param.name: excludeemptypost
param.label: Exclude Blogger with zero post
param.description: Exclude Blogger with zero post from display in module.

param.name: onlyfeatured
param.label: Show only featured bloggers
param.description: Show only featured bloggers in the module.

param.name: cache
param.label: Caching
param.description: Select whether to cache the content of this module

param.name: cache_time
param.label: Cache Time
param.description: The time before the module is recached
